title: Gray Warwick bugs
body:
I've owned Grey Warwick ever since the RAF system dropped the required number of people to obtain this skin. 
I loaded into a bot match a bit ago to check out the skin and during the loading screen I didn't have the Vintage loading screen slice. Are vintage slices only shown during PvP matches? 

In game, whenever I would use Grey Warwick's E, the sound of his howl was missing. The animation and visuals would go off, but he wouldn't howl.

I figure there aren't many Grey Warwick owners/users, so I figured I'd throw these out there so you can get some data.

replies.body:
Hey Shuyin!

Unfortunately there was a cut off date for the vintage border on Grey Warwick, it looks like you obtained the skin after that day. 

As for the howl, I just loaded him up in game and everything looked good, are you still seeing this issue? If so are you doing anything while casting E? Or there is a chance that a volume setting is low that could be affecting this audio.

When I loaded into the game today the howl issue was gone, I don't know how or why but I'm glad it is.
Thanks again for your time.

To bad about the vintage thing, but that's a whatever.

As for the howl, it's the only sound effect that doesn't play. Every other sound effect seems fine, but tomorrow when I do my morning match I'll check it out again and adjust the volume to see if that changes anything. 

Thank you for your time and I'll give you an update tomorrow.
Hey when was the cut off date for these vintage borders because I've owned both skins too and don't have the border... I don't remember even reading about them getting vintage borders.
I think the vintage borders only apply to the skins received from the original version of RAF.
